title: Sodom - Obsessed by Cruelty (1985 - Steamhammer Version)
description:
This is the rare second recording of this classic extreme thrash album, only available on Steamhammer Records in LP form. The original mix of the album was very noisy and rough, so they re-recorded the entire thing. The much improved re-recording is what you're getting here. For whatever reason, the first mix was released through Metal Blade to most countries when the album came out. All versions of the album on the market today contain the rough mix. Hear this album how it was meant to be heard!

Sodom - Obsessed by Cruelty (1985)

01. Intro (The Rebirth...)
02. Deathlike Silence
03. Brandish the Sceptre
04. Proselytism Real
05. Equinox
06. After the Deluge
07. Obsessed by Cruelty
08. Fall of Majesty Town
09. Nuctemeron
10. Pretenders to the Throne
11. Witchhammer
12. Volcanic Slut
